reviews.text: Just back a week from the Hollywood Mirage where we had a great relaxing week our apartment was large clean and comfortable with a large terrace overlooking the pool area with the sea beyond the sunsets were lovely.
reviews.title: Had a great time

reviews.text: We booked with RCI as an exchange it was the first time we had booked an exchange and had no problems at all we did have guest services knocking on our door the first morning a very nice young man asking if we would be interested in giving some feedback on the resort we told him that we were just there to relax and had no intentions of purchasing anything or upgrading or anything else that might be involved but he assured us it was just feedback he was interested in however when he returned the following day my husband polietly told him we were not interested and he said that was no problem and we were not bothered again.
reviews.title: use the deposit box

likes.disliked: — not kept to gold crown standards

reviews.title: Loved my holiday at the Hollywood Mirage
reviews.text: There are some lovely resturants nearby if you cant face going down the hill the ones we liked best were Rosies Cantina a Mexican about five to ten mins walk great decor and good food and Bella Roma right on the doorstep really nice staff and the food is lovely if you dont want to have to wait for a table best get there by 7.30pm Also went to the Slow Boat chinese on recommendation from a girl at work there are at least seven of these around the resort but we went to the one at the Santiago shops went in during the day and booked a table glad we did as it was really busy we had a set meal which was excellant value.

Family of 6 just returned from the mirage. This apartment is at the top of the hill. Views of the back hill , pool and wondeful views of Los Crisiantos. If you can book the fourth to 6th floors. with the views of the sea it would be the best. The 5thfloor have penthouse apartments with washer/dryer and dishwasher.
reviews.title: I doubt RCI has anything better

reviews.text: Being a spoilt american- i expected to have a dishwasher or washer- but i put my children to work instead.
reviews.title: Relaxing holiday

reviews.text: Yes, there is quite a sales pitch,but be firm, they are only trying to make a living.
reviews.title: Good family holiday - a bit of a trek from the main hub

reviews.text: The outside pool is nice with kids pool shaded. Bar and restuarant fantastic. For the kids, i really liked the kids pizza 5.75 euros with ice cream.
reviews.title: Nice place, shame about the salesmen.

likes.liked: — Very clean and well maintained. Good local restaurants. Excellent location.
likes.disliked: — Persistant time-share salesmen called four times in six days.

reviews.text: I think the resort is aware of their isolation, so there food/drink prices are not too high. But within walking distance there are lots of resturants. Be careful with their recommendations- Meson Castellon was very expensive- we left paying 140E.
reviews.title: Suggest you read more than the first few reviews here!

likes.disliked: — Sales reps constantly calling round and 'phoning.
